timeline.bodyText: what is the difference to broker.standalone?
timeline.author: Zelldon
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,287 @@
+# Zeebe Broker configuration file (without embedded gateway)

replies.bodyText: Ok the only difference is embedded gateway? I'm asking myself whether this is really necessary to have two separate files for that.
replies.author: Zelldon

replies.bodyText: That's what we decided to do. The one file is for people who just want to test Zeebe standalone, the other is for people who want to configure nodes in a cluster. The documentation also hints into that direction
replies.author: pihme
